::KitKat::

"Well, I don't know who your last leader was, but I won't do anything 
like that. Nope, I just don't believe in  hurting others just to be 
mean.  It's not in my programming.  I don't mind killing a Maximal, 
but I don't go hurting others on my team."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Time Bomb smiled and stood up.
> 
> "You are not going to hurt us? I used to miss a spot on cleaning 
the old
> base and my leader would nail me to a cross!" Time Bomb said. His 
hands were
> mangled, looking as if nails were driven through them...
